name: Space Force: Lightsaber Wars
description:
Build amazing realistic lightsabers and destroy and beat everything you see in the new Space Force game! This action game is made specifically for fans of the stellar universe.

Do you like spaceships, stars and action adventures?

Make your own lightsaber and use all your force! Try different types of metals!
Use different colors for your sword – you can choose between the dark side and the light side!

Stunning 3D graphics and visual effects will bring your creations to life as you slash and strike down everything you see!

It takes great skill and oneness with the Force to wield a lightsaber properly.

Why you'll love Space Force:
+ Dozens of saber build combinations
+ Choose your own saber blade colors
+ Realistic 3D graphics
+ New content will be added regularly!!

Grab your lightsaber, activate the concentrated beam, and battle!
The most powerful weapon in the universe is back – and now in your pocket!

Build amazing realistic lightsabers. Cut, destroy and beat everything you see! Feel yourself a true knight and choose your side: light or dark!

Become a hero from the space saga!
